com.opencredo.concourse.mapping.events.methods.proxying

Interface ProxyingEventBus

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.function.Consumer<Event>, EventBus, EventOutChannel

    public interface ProxyingEventBus
extends EventBus
    An EventBus that generates proxies for event-emitter interfaces.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default <L,R> void dispatch(Class<L> leftKlass, Class<R> rightKlass, java.util.function.BiConsumer<L,R> dispatchersConsumer)
      Create proxy instances of the supplied interfaces, and pass them to the supplied BiConsumer to emit events.
      default <T> void dispatch(Class<T> klass, java.util.function.Consumer<T> dispatcherConsumer)
      Create a proxy instance of the supplied interface, and pass it to the supplied Consumer to emit events.
      default <T> T getDispatcherFor(Class<T> klass)
      Get a proxy instance of the supplied interface that will create and complete a distinct batch containing a single event for each event-emitting method invocation.
      static ProxyingEventBus proxying(EventBus eventBus)
      Create a ProxyingEventBus that dispatches events via the supplied EventBus

      • Methods inherited from interface com.opencredo.concourse.domain.events.dispatching.EventBus

        accept, dispatch, processingWith, startBatch, toEventsOutChannel

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.function.Consumer

        andThen

    • Method Detail

      • proxying

        static ProxyingEventBus proxying(EventBus eventBus)
        Create a ProxyingEventBus that dispatches events via the supplied EventBus
        Parameters:
        eventBus - The EventBus to dispatch events to.
        Returns:
        The constructed ProxyingEventBus.

      • dispatch

        default <T> void dispatch(Class<T> klass,
                          java.util.function.Consumer<T> dispatcherConsumer)
        Create a proxy instance of the supplied interface, and pass it to the supplied Consumer to emit events.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the proxy object.
        Parameters:
        klass - The interface to proxy.
        dispatcherConsumer - The Consumer that will use the proxy object to emit events.

      • dispatch

        default <L,R> void dispatch(Class<L> leftKlass,
                            Class<R> rightKlass,
                            java.util.function.BiConsumer<L,R> dispatchersConsumer)
        Create proxy instances of the supplied interfaces, and pass them to the supplied BiConsumer to emit events.
        Type Parameters:
        L - The type of the "left" proxy object.
        R - The type of the "right" proxy object.
        Parameters:
        leftKlass - The "left" interface to proxy.
        rightKlass - The "right" interface to proxy.
        dispatchersConsumer - The BiConsumer that will use the proxy objects to emit events.

      • getDispatcherFor

        default <T> T getDispatcherFor(Class<T> klass)
        Get a proxy instance of the supplied interface that will create and complete a distinct batch containing a single event for each event-emitting method invocation.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the proxy object.
        Parameters:
        klass - The interface to proxy.
        Returns:
        The constructed proxy object.
